row 5 rs sl1p k4 work texture row 2 over next 5 row 3 ws purl all stitches stitches knit to 1 stitch before marker repeat row 2 & 3 five more times 9/21/33/21/9 kfb sm kfb knit to 1 stitch before before marker kfb sm kfb knit to kfb knit to 1 stitch before marker kfb 10 stitches from end of row work slip marker kfb knit to 1 stitch before texture row 2 over next 5 stitches marker kfb slip marker kfb knit to 2 knit 5 stitches from end of row m1l k2 row 6 ws sl1p k4 purl to 5 stitches from end of row 11/23/35/23/11 knit 5 shaping row 2 ws purl all stitches repeat row 3 to 6 three more times repeat shaping row 1 & 2 twice more 15/27/39/27/15 until you have the following stitch count 31/45/57/45/31 don t forget buttonholes every 3-4cm part b lower chest sleeve separation row rs sl1p k4 work texture rs backwards loop cast on 7 stitches at the start of row 1 over next 5 stitches then knit your row then remaining front stitches remove marker row 1 rs knit to 1 stitch before marker next 5 23/29/41/29/16 stitches knit 5 ws backwards loop cast on 7 stitches at the start of your sleeves are now on waste yarn and remaining live on your row then your needles are 2 fronts and the back
